description: If you thought you'd tried every roast pork recipe, then try this one with these incredible zucchini stuffing balls. They're so easy to make, too.
name: Roast Pork With Zucchini Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place pumpkin and potato on a baking paper-lined baking tray. Bake along with pork for a further 1 hour, adding stuffing balls to tray in the last 15 minutes of cooking, or until vegetables are tender and pork is golden and cooked through. Cover pork loosely with foil and rest for 15 minutes. Thinly slice. Serve pork with vegetables and stuffing balls.
